short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get fast AI generated responses for emails

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduce the stress of replying to emails with the use of GPTmail. Simply paste in the email you are replying to and it will generate a great response for you. Copy the response and tweak it to your satisfaction to reduce the time you spend thinking about your emails. Enjoy :)
